fields.name: Aim of Study
fields.description: State the main purpose or objective of the study as described by the authors
fields.value: To develop an LLM-based chatbot application (PRObot) that enhances patient-reported outcome measures (PROMs) for diabetic retinopathy by enabling patients to provide feedback on their quality of life and treatment progress via an interactive application.
fields.evidence_quote: "We present an outline of the first large language model (LLM) based chatbot application in the context of patient- reported outcome measures (PROMs) for diabetic retinopathy. By utilizing the capabilities of current LLMs, we enable patients to provide feedback about their quality of life and treatment progress via an interactive application."

fields.name: Key Findings
fields.description: Summarize the main results or conclusions of the study
fields.value: The paper presents a proposed framework for an interactive chatbot (PRObot) that uses LLMs to personalize and dynamically administer PROM questionnaires, allowing patients to provide more detailed feedback. Qualitative results from simulated dialogues show the PRObot can generate tailored questions and empathetic responses.
fields.evidence_quote: "We propose a novel PROM framework that leverages the capabilities of LLMs to perform a dynamic and more person- alized survey of patients...The examples show that the simulation of patients results in the generation of exciting dialogues, which enables an initial evaluation of the proposed approach."
